description.fr:
{Affinity:37}\_: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.37.avA} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de votre héros.
\---
Confère à votre héros {value:Affinity.37.perAR,percent} de son {%AT} en {%AR,plural:other} si {value:Affinity.37.target} adversaires sont touchés.
description.en:
{Affinity:37}: Does {magicalDamage:Affinity.37.avA} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> your hero.
\---
Confers {value:Affinity.37.perAR,percent} of their {%AT} as {%AR,plural:other} on your hero if {value:Affinity.37.target} opponents are hit.
description.es:
{Affinity:37}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.37.avA} alrededor de\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de tu héroe.
\---
Confiere a tu héroe un {value:Affinity.37.perAR,percent} de su {%AT} en {%AR,plural:other} si {value:Affinity.37.target} adversarios son alcanzados.
description.de:
{Affinity:37}: Verursacht {magicalDamage:Affinity.37.avA} ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"> deines Helden.
\---
Gewährt deinem Helden {value:Affinity.37.perAR,percent} seines {%AT} als {%AR,plural:other}, wenn {value:Affinity.37.target}\_Gegner getroffen sind.
description.pt:
{Affinity:37}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.37.avA} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> do seu herói.
\---
Concede ao seu herói {value:Affinity.37.perAR,percent} de seu {%AT} em {%AR,plural:other} se {value:Affinity.37.target} adversários forem atingidos.

bgDescription.fr: Oubliez la dentelle, la porcelaine et les détails et foncez.
bgDescription.en: Forget about lace, fine porcelain and details\_– go for it!
bgDescription.es: Déjate de encajes, porcelanas y detallitos, y saca la artillería.
bgDescription.de: Vergiss Spitze, das Porzellan oder sonstige Details und leg los!
bgDescription.pt: Deixe de lado as sedas, as porcelanas e os detalhes e vá com tudo.
